channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 5 streetlights out on Pittville Circus, 7th January
item.description:
All around the north side of pittville Circus. The streetlights have not worked for over 2 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Pittville Circus, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reinstatement across the road has sunk significantly., 7th January
item.description:
On carriageway heading into Bishops Cleese about 50 mtrs before the esso garage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Pothole appearing at side of road, 7th January
item.description:

item.title: Sinking drain cover, 7th January
item.description:

item.title: Wide and deep pothole, 7th January
item.description:

item.title: Two potholes on either side of Maple Drive, by no 38, 7th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Maple Drive, Cheltenham

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 7th January
item.description:
Email regarding new drainage.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole western side of road is failing, 7th January
item.description:
The whole side of the road is failing as vehicles try to pass each other. The road is not up to the increasing amounts of traffic using it from the nearby housing developments. Another example of GCC failing to ensure infrastructure is up to the increased demands of new housing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
